Start initializing
Lock the system
Unlock the system
Change the operating state (e.g. AUTO, MANUAL, ...)
Start up the pumps (this will first trigger a reset() command!)
Reset the errors (including the programmed ones and the TwinSAFE group ones)
Reset the errors (including the programmed ones and the TwinSAFE group ones)
Reset the errors (including the programmed ones and the TwinSAFE group ones)
Unblock the telescope (if possible, i.e. if no E-Stops are active etc.)
Bypass the doors sensors for the number of seconds defined in the config
Bypass the doors sensors permanently (until re-initialization)
Stop bypassing the doors sensors
Reset the errors (including the programmed ones and the TwinSAFE group ones)
Is the I/O in a healthy state?
Is the I/O in a healthy state?
Is the I/O in a healthy state?
Is the safety in a healthy state? Good=RUN, Bad=safe stopped
Is the safety busy?
Are the emergency stops in a healthy state? Good=RUN, Bad=safe stopped
Is the safety busy?
Are the emergency stops in a healthy state? Good=RUN, Bad=safe stopped
Is the safety busy?
Is the safety busy?
Is everything unblocked? Good=unblocked, Bad=safe stopped
Bit pattern, for which bit=high means alert active, bit=low means alert off
Number of bits of the bitPattern to use (between 1 and 32)
Sound length of 1 bit, in milliseconds
The time, in number of milliseconds, during which the pattern is repeated. 0 means repeat forever.
True if the dome access control system should be disabled permanently.
Time until during which the doors sensors are being bypassed after entering the password, in seconds
Sound to play when the doors sensors are being bypassed
LED pattern to play when the doors sensors are now bypassed permanently
Sound to play when a door is being opened for the first time (i.e. when a person is entering)
Sound to play when a door is being opened for the 2nd or 3rd or ... time (i.e. when a person is leaving)
Sound to play when the personHasLeftButton is pressed when the doors are closed
Sound to play when the personHasLeftButton is pressed when the doors are still open
LED pattern to play when the doors were opened without bypass (i.e. without password)

ST.xhtml: initialize := THIS^.processes.initialize.request();
lock := THIS^.processes.lock.request();
unlock := THIS^.processes.unlock.request();
changeOperatingState := THIS^.processes.changeOperatingState.request( state := state );

documentation.xhtml: Name of this function block instance
Buffer to write all logging to
Temporary buffer to write logging by parts (sub-statemachines) to

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.hydraulics._log( name := 'hydraulics', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.emergencyStops._log( name := 'emergencyStops', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.domeAccess._log( name := 'domeAccess', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.motionBlocking._log( name := 'motionBlocking', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.io._log( name := 'io', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.configManager._log( name := 'configManager', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));

documentation.xhtml: TwinSAFE group communication error
TwinSAFE group function block error
TwinSAFE group output error
TRUE if the pumps are powered
TRUE if the oil return filter has an overpressure
TRUE if the pumps run at a minimum frequency (frequency > QMin)
TRUE if the frequency of the pumps is not rising after a startup command
TRUE if the pressure is not rising after the frequency is rising
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Top pipe 1
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Top pipe 2
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Top pipe 3
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Top pipe 4
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Bottom pipe 5
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Bottom pipe 6
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Bottom pipe 7
TRUE if there is no underpressure for Bottom pipe 8
TRUE if there is no overpressure for the Top pipes
TRUE if there is no overpressure for the Bottom pipes
TRUE if there is no TRIP error for the top drive
TRUE if there is no overpressure for the botton drive
TRUE if there is no underpressure for all 8 pipes
TRUE if there is no underpressure for all 8 pipes (even momentarily, without delay)
TRUE if there is an underpressure problem (e.g. when the pumps are running and there is an underpressure)
TRUE if there is no overpressure for all 8 pipes
TRUE if the pumps are restarting
TRUE if the pumps are stopped
TRUE if the pumps are running
TRUE if the pumps are released (RFR 'ReglerFreigabe' high)
TRUE if the hydraulics are OK
